link.title: Phineas and Ferb: Across the 2nd Dimension

category.term: Phineas and Ferb: Across the 2nd Dimension
category.label: ConTopic

content.div:
Platforms: PS3, DS, Wii

The lovable overachievers of the Disney Channel family are being sent on a mission to save the world. It's an adventure filled with wacky characters, bizarre bad guys and just about every challenge imaginable. If this seems too difficult to attempt alone, bring along a friend and blast, jump and work together to make the missions more manageable.

"Phineas and Ferb: Across the 2nd Dimension" is an action game that features a bevy of platforming, racing and shooting elements found in other games of the genre. The twist is that it features all of the quirky characters and equipment seen in the hit Disney cartoon. Aside from playing as the stars of the show, you'll also have eight more characters to choose from, including Perry the Platypus and the all-new Agent T, a cute turtle spy. Your arsenal will consist of the abnormal, which includes the Carbonator, an orange soda-flinging cannon, and an anti-gravity ray.

If you love the wacky antics found on "Phineas and Ferb," it won't be a difficult decision on whether you'll buy the game. For gamers less educated on the summer-loving duo, the fun, stylized gameplay and hilarious moments may be just enough to entertain and challenge.
